about_the_game:
Be the propeller king in the battleground! 8 vs 8 matches with online players or bots, destroy the enemy and capture their bases to win!

- Up to 6 helicopters to unlock and play with it
- Use the minigun to destroy the enemy
- Purchase stronger turrets to defend your base.
- Buy extra missiles early in the pre-match for greater chance of winning.
- Fast and fun 5 minute matches for up to 8 peoples or play with bots.
detailed_description:
Be the propeller king in the battleground! 8 vs 8 matches with online players or bots, destroy the enemy and capture their bases to win!

- Buy extra missiles early in the pre-match for greater chance of winning.
- Fast and fun 5 minute matches for up to 8 peoples or play with bots.

name: Propeller King

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core I3 | AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1030
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5 | Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Be the propeller king in the battleground! 8 vs 8 matches with online players or bots, destroy the enemy and capture their bases to win!
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
